queries.query: CREATE TABLE D_M${localChannelId} ( ID BIGINT NOT NULL, SERVER_ID NVARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, RECEIVED_DATE DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, PROCESSED BIT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, ORIGINAL_ID BIGINT, IMPORT_ID BIGINT, IMPORT_CHANNEL_ID NVARCHAR(36), CONSTRAINT D_M${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(ID) )
CREATE INDEX D_M${localChannelId}_INDEX1 ON D_M${localChannelId}(ID, SERVER_ID)

CREATE TABLE D_MM${localChannelId} ( ID INTEGER NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, SERVER_ID NVARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, RECEIVED_DATE DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, STATUS CHAR(1) NOT NULL, CONNECTOR_NAME NVARCHAR(MAX), SEND_ATTEMPTS INTEGER DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, SEND_DATE DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, RESPONSE_DATE DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, ERROR_CODE INTEGER DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, CHAIN_ID INTEGER NOT NULL, ORDER_ID INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT D_MM${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(MESSAGE_ID, ID), CONSTRAINT D_MM${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID) REFERENCES D_M${localChannelId}(ID) ON DELETE CASCADE )
CREATE INDEX D_MM${localChannelId}_INDEX1 ON D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, ID, STATUS)
CREATE INDEX D_MM${localChannelId}_INDEX2 ON D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, SERVER_ID, ID)
CREATE INDEX D_MM${localChannelId}_INDEX3 ON D_MM${localChannelId}(ID, STATUS, SERVER_ID)
CREATE INDEX D_MM${localChannelId}_FKI ON D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID)

CREATE TABLE D_MC${localChannelId} ( METADATA_ID INTEGER NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CONTENT_TYPE INTEGER NOT NULL, CONTENT NVARCHAR(MAX), IS_ENCRYPTED BIT NOT NULL, DATA_TYPE NVARCHAR(255), CONSTRAINT D_MC${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID, CONTENT_TYPE), CONSTRAINT D_MC${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID) REFERENCES D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, ID) ON DELETE CASCADE )
CREATE INDEX D_MC${localChannelId}_FKI ON D_MC${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID)

CREATE TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ( METADATA_ID INTEGER NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT D_MCM${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID), CONSTRAINT D_MCM${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID) REFERENCES D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, ID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE D_MA${localChannelId} ( ID NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, TYPE NVARCHAR(40), SEGMENT_ID INTEGER NOT NULL, ATTACHMENT_SIZE INTEGER NOT NULL, CONTENT IMAGE, CONSTRAINT D_MA${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID) REFERENCES D_M${localChannelId}(ID) ON DELETE CASCADE )
CREATE INDEX D_MA${localChannelId}_INDEX1 ON D_MA${localChannelId}(ID)
CREATE INDEX D_MA${localChannelId}_FKI ON D_MA${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID)

CREATE TABLE D_MS${localChannelId} ( METADATA_ID INTEGER, SERVER_ID NVARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, RECEIVED BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, RECEIVED_LIFETIME BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, FILTERED BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, FILTERED_LIFETIME BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, SENT BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, SENT_LIFETIME BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, ERROR BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, ERROR_LIFETIME BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL )
CREATE INDEX D_MS${localChannelId}_INDEX1 ON D_MS${localChannelId}(METADATA_ID, SERVER_ID)
INSERT INTO D_MSQ${localChannelId} VALUES (1)

CREATE TABLE D_CHANNELS ( LOCAL_CHANNEL_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CHANNEL_ID NVARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT D_CHANNELS_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(LOCAL_CHANNEL_ID), CONSTRAINT UNIQUE_CHANNEL_ID UNIQUE (CHANNEL_ID) )
DROP TABLE D_M${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MM${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MC${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MA${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MS${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MSQ${localChannelId}
DELETE FROM D_CHANNELS WHERE LOCAL_CHANNEL_ID = ${localChannelId}
UPDATE D_MSQ${localChannelId} SET ID = ID + 1
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD "${columnName}" NVARCHAR(255)
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD "${columnName}" DECIMAL(31, 15)
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD "${columnName}" BIT
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD "${columnName}" DATETIME DEFAULT NULL
UPDATE D_M${localChannelId} SET PROCESSED = 1 WHERE ID = ?
UPDATE D_M${localChannelId} SET PROCESSED = 0, IMPORT_ID = NULL, IMPORT_CHANNEL_ID = NULL WHERE ID = ?
DELETE FROM D_M${localChannelId}
DELETE FROM D_MM${localChannelId}
TRUNCATE TABLE D_MC${localChannelId}
TRUNCATE TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId}
TRUNCATE TABLE D_MA${localChannelId}
SELECT MM.ID, MM.STATUS FROM D_M${localChannelId} M JOIN D_MM${localChannelId} MM ON MM.MESSAGE_ID = M.ID WHERE M.ID = ? AND M.PROCESSED = 1
SELECT * FROM D_MM${localChannelId} WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ? AND ID IN (${metaDataIds}) ORDER BY CHAIN_ID ASC, ORDER_ID ASC

UPDATE D_MS${localChannelId} WITH (TABLOCK) SET RECEIVED = CASE WHEN RECEIVED + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE RECEIVED + ? END, RECEIVED_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN RECEIVED_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE RECEIVED_LIFETIME + ? END, FILTERED = CASE WHEN FILTERED + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE FILTERED + ? END, FILTERED_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN FILTERED_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE FILTERED_LIFETIME + ? END, SENT = CASE WHEN SENT + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SENT + ? END, SENT_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN SENT_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SENT_LIFETIME + ? END, ERROR = CASE WHEN ERROR + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE ERROR + ? END, ERROR_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN ERROR_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE ERROR_LIFETIME + ? END
WHERE METADATA_ID IS NULL AND SERVER_ID = ?

UPDATE D_MS${localChannelId} WITH (TABLOCK) SET RECEIVED = CASE WHEN RECEIVED + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE RECEIVED + ? END, RECEIVED_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN RECEIVED_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE RECEIVED_LIFETIME + ? END, FILTERED = CASE WHEN FILTERED + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE FILTERED + ? END, FILTERED_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN FILTERED_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE FILTERED_LIFETIME + ? END, SENT = CASE WHEN SENT + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SENT + ? END, SENT_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN SENT_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SENT_LIFETIME + ? END, ERROR = CASE WHEN ERROR + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE ERROR + ? END, ERROR_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN ERROR_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE ERROR_LIFETIME + ? END
WHERE METADATA_ID = ? AND SERVER_ID = ?
